entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
